tokens.text: returns particle color for the block located in the sur...

description: Returns the particle color for the block located in the surface below the entity (scanned up to 10 blocks down). The struct contains '.r' '.g' '.b' and '.a' members, each 0.0 to 1.0. If no entity is specified or if no surface is found, each member value is set to 0.0. Available on the Client (Resource Packs) only.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Surface Particle Color
